value.halfverse: who walk in the law of the LORD!
value.verse: Happy are they whose way is blameless, *
Happy are they who observe his decrees *
value.halfverse: and seek him with all their hearts!

value.verse: Who never do any wrong, *
value.halfverse: but always walk in his ways.
that we should fully keep them.
value.verse: You laid down your commandments, *
Oh, that my ways were made so direct *
value.halfverse: that I might keep your statutes!
when I regard all your commandments.
value.verse: Then I should not be put to shame, *
I will thank you with an unfeigned heart, *
value.halfverse: when I have learned your righteous judgments.
do not utterly forsake me.
value.verse: I will keep your statutes; *

value.halfverse: By keeping to your words.
value.verse: How shall a young man cleanse his way? *
With my whole heart I seek you; *
value.halfverse: let me not stray from your commandments.

value.verse: I treasure your promise in my heart, *
value.halfverse: that I may not sin against you.
instruct me in your statutes.
value.verse: Blessed are you, O LORD; *

value.halfverse: all the judgments of your mouth.
value.verse: With my lips will I recite *

value.halfverse: than in all manner of riches.
value.verse: I have taken greater delight in the way of your decrees *

value.halfverse: and give attention to your ways.
value.verse: I will meditate on your commandments *
My delight is in your statutes; *
value.halfverse: I will not forget your word.
that I may live and keep your word.
value.verse: Deal bountifully with your servant, *
Open my eyes, that I may see *
value.halfverse: the wonders of your law.
do not hide your commandments from me.
value.verse: I am a stranger here on earth; *

value.halfverse: with longing for your judgments.
value.verse: My soul is consumed at all times *

value.halfverse: cursed are they who stray from your commandments!
value.verse: You have rebuked the insolent; *
Turn from me shame and rebuke, *
value.halfverse: for I have kept your decrees.

value.verse: Even though rulers sit and plot against me, *
value.halfverse: I will meditate on your statutes.

value.verse: For your decrees are my delight, *
value.halfverse: and they are my counselors.
give me life according to your word.
value.verse: My soul cleaves to the dust; *
I have confessed my ways, and you answered me; *
value.halfverse: instruct me in your statutes.

value.verse: Make me understand the way of your commandments, *
value.halfverse: that I may meditate on your marvelous works.

value.verse: My soul melts away for sorrow; *
value.halfverse: strengthen me according to your word.

value.verse: Take from me the way of lying; *
value.halfverse: let me find grace through your law.
I have set your judgments before me.
value.verse: I have chosen the way of faithfulness; *
I hold fast to your decrees; *
value.halfverse: O LORD, let me not be put to shame.
for you have set my heart at liberty.
value.verse: I will run the way of your commandments, *
Teach me, O LORD, the way of your statutes, *
value.halfverse: and I shall keep it to the end.
I shall keep it with all my heart.
value.verse: Give me understanding, and I shall keep your law; *
Make me go in the path of your commandments, *
value.halfverse: for that is my desire.
and not to unjust gain.
value.verse: Incline my heart to your decrees *
Turn my eyes from watching what is worthless; *
value.halfverse: give me life in your ways.
which you make to those who fear you.
value.verse: Fulfill your promise to your servant, *
Turn away the reproach which I dread, *
value.halfverse: because your judgments are good.

value.verse: Behold, I long for your commandments; *
value.halfverse: in your righteousness preserve my life.

value.verse: Let your loving-kindness come to me, O LORD, *
value.halfverse: and your salvation, according to your promise.

value.verse: Then shall I have a word for those who taunt me, *
value.halfverse: because I trust in your words.
for my hope is in your judgments.
value.verse: Do not take the word of truth out of my mouth, *

value.halfverse: I shall keep it for ever and ever.
value.verse: I shall continue to keep your law; *

value.halfverse: because I study your commandments.
value.verse: I will walk at liberty, *

value.halfverse: and will not be ashamed.
value.verse: I will tell of your decrees before kings *

value.halfverse: which I have always loved.
value.verse: I delight in your commandments, *

value.halfverse: and I will meditate on your statutes.
value.verse: I will lift up my hands to your commandments, *

value.halfverse: because you have given me hope.
value.verse: Remember your word to your servant, *

value.halfverse: that your promise gives me life.
value.verse: This is my comfort in my trouble, *

value.halfverse: but I have not turned from your law.
value.verse: The proud have derided me cruelly, *

value.halfverse: O LORD, I take great comfort.
value.verse: When I remember your judgments of old, *

value.halfverse: because of the wicked who forsake your law.
value.verse: I am filled with a burning rage, *

value.halfverse: wherever I have lived as a stranger.
value.verse: Your statutes have been like songs to me *

value.halfverse: and dwell upon your law.
value.verse: I remember your Name in the night, O LORD, *
This is how it has been with me, *
value.halfverse: because I have kept your commandments.
I have promised to keep your words.
value.verse: You only are my portion, O LORD; *
I entreat you with all my heart, *
value.halfverse: be merciful to me according to your promise.

value.verse: I have considered my ways *
value.halfverse: and turned my feet toward your decrees.

value.verse: I hasten and do not tarry *
value.halfverse: to keep your commandments.
I do not forget your law.
value.verse: Though the cords of the wicked entangle me, *

value.halfverse: because of your righteous judgments.
value.verse: At midnight I will rise to give you thanks, *

value.halfverse: and of those who keep your commandments.
value.verse: I am a companion of all who fear you *

value.halfverse: instruct me in your statutes.
value.verse: The earth, O LORD, is full of your love; *
O LORD, you have dealt graciously with your servant, *
value.halfverse: according to your word.
for I have believed in your commandments.
value.verse: Teach me discernment and knowledge, *
Before I was afflicted I went astray, *
value.halfverse: but now I keep your word.
instruct me in your statutes.
value.verse: You are good and you bring forth good; *
The proud have smeared me with lies, *
value.halfverse: but I will keep your commandments with my whole heart.
but my delight is in your law.
value.verse: Their heart is gross and fat, *

value.halfverse: that I might learn your statutes.
value.verse: It is good for me that I have been afflicted, *

value.halfverse: than thousands in gold and silver.
value.verse: The law of your mouth is dearer to me *

value.halfverse: give me understanding, that I may learn your commandments.
value.verse: Your hands have made me and fashioned me; *

value.halfverse: because I trust in your word.
value.verse: Those who fear you will be glad when they see me, *
I know, O LORD, that your judgments are right *
value.halfverse: and that in faithfulness you have afflicted me.

value.verse: Let your loving-kindness be my comfort, *
value.halfverse: as you have promised to your servant.
for your law is my delight.
value.verse: Let your compassion come to me, that I may live, *

value.halfverse: but I will meditate on your commandments.
value.verse: Let the arrogant be put to shame, for they wrong me with lies; *
Let those who fear you turn to me, *
value.halfverse: and also those who know your decrees.
that I may not be put to shame.
value.verse: Let my heart be sound in your statutes, *

value.halfverse: I have put my hope in your word.
value.verse: My soul has longed for your salvation; *
My eyes have failed from watching for your promise, *
value.halfverse: and I say, “When will you comfort me?”
but I have not forgotten your statutes.
value.verse: I have become like a leather flask in the smoke, *
How much longer must I wait? *
value.halfverse: when will you give judgment against those who persecute me?

value.verse: The proud have dug pits for me; *
value.halfverse: they do not keep your law.
help me, for they persecute me with lies.
value.verse: All your commandments are true; *
They had almost made an end of me on earth, *
value.halfverse: but I have not forsaken your commandments.

value.verse: In your loving-kindness, revive me, *
value.halfverse: that I may keep the decrees of your mouth.

value.verse: O LORD, your word is everlasting; *
value.halfverse: it stands firm in the heavens.

value.verse: Your faithfulness remains from one generation to another; *
value.halfverse: you established the earth, and it abides.
for all things are your servants.
value.verse: By your decree these continue to this day, *

value.halfverse: I should have perished in my affliction.
value.verse: If my delight had not been in your law, *

value.halfverse: because by them you give me life.
value.verse: I will never forget your commandments, *

value.halfverse: for I study your commandments.
value.verse: I am yours; oh, that you would save me! *
Though the wicked lie in wait for me to destroy me, *
value.halfverse: I will apply my mind to your decrees.

value.verse: I see that all things come to an end, *
value.halfverse: but your commandment has no bounds.

value.verse: Oh, how I love your law! *
value.halfverse: all the day long it is in my mind.

value.verse: Your commandment has made me wiser than my enemies, *
value.halfverse: and it is always with me.

value.verse: I have more understanding than all my teachers, *
value.halfverse: for your decrees are my study.
because I observe your commandments.
value.verse: I am wiser than the elders, *

value.halfverse: that I may keep your word.
value.verse: I restrain my feet from every evil way, *

value.halfverse: because you yourself have taught me.
value.verse: I do not shrink from your judgments, *
How sweet are your words to my taste! *
value.halfverse: they are sweeter than honey to my mouth.
therefore I hate every lying way.
value.verse: Through your commandments I gain understanding; *
Your word is a lantern to my feet *
value.halfverse: and a light upon my path.
to keep your righteous judgments.
value.verse: I have sworn and am determined *

value.halfverse: preserve my life, O LORD, according to your word.
value.verse: I am deeply troubled; *
Accept, O LORD, the willing tribute of my lips, *
value.halfverse: and teach me your judgments.
yet I do not forget your law.
value.verse: My life is always in my hand, *

value.halfverse: but I have not strayed from your commandments.
value.verse: The wicked have set a trap for me, *

value.halfverse: truly, they are the joy of my heart.
value.verse: Your decrees are my inheritance for ever; *
I have applied my heart to fulfill your statutes *
value.halfverse: for ever and to the end.
but your law do I love.
value.verse: I hate those who have a divided heart, *
You are my refuge and shield; *
value.halfverse: my hope is in your word.

value.verse: Away from me, you wicked! *
value.halfverse: I will keep the commandments of my God.

value.verse: Sustain me according to your promise, that I may live, *
value.halfverse: and let me not be disappointed in my hope.

value.verse: Hold me up, and I shall be safe, *
value.halfverse: and my delight shall be ever in your statutes.

value.verse: You spurn all who stray from your statutes; *
value.halfverse: their deceitfulness is in vain.
therefore I love your decrees.
value.verse: In your sight all the wicked of the earth are but dross; *

value.halfverse: I am afraid of your judgments.
value.verse: My flesh trembles with dread of you; *
I have done what is just and right; *
value.halfverse: do not deliver me to my oppressors.
let not the proud oppress me.
value.verse: Be surety for your servant’s good; *

value.halfverse: and for your righteous promise.
value.verse: My eyes have failed from watching for your salvation *

value.halfverse: and teach me your statutes.
value.verse: Deal with your servant according to your loving-kindness *
I am your servant; grant me understanding, *
value.halfverse: that I may know your decrees.
for they have broken your law.
value.verse: It is time for you to act, O LORD, *

value.halfverse: more than gold and precious stones.
value.verse: Truly, I love your commandments *

value.halfverse: all paths of falsehood I abhor.
value.verse: I hold all your commandments to be right for me; *
Your decrees are wonderful; *
value.halfverse: therefore I obey them with all my heart.
it gives understanding to the simple.
value.verse: When your word goes forth it gives light; *
I open my mouth and pant; *
value.halfverse: I long for your commandments.

value.verse: Turn to me in mercy, *
value.halfverse: as you always do to those who love your Name.
let no iniquity have dominion over me.
value.verse: Steady my footsteps in your word; *
Rescue me from those who oppress me, *
value.halfverse: and I will keep your commandments.
and teach me your statutes.
value.verse: Let your countenance shine upon your servant *

value.halfverse: because people do not keep your law.
value.verse: My eyes shed streams of tears, *

value.halfverse: and upright are your judgments.
value.verse: You are righteous, O LORD, *
You have issued your decrees *
value.halfverse: with justice and in perfect faithfulness.

value.verse: My indignation has consumed me, *
value.halfverse: because my enemies forget your words.

value.verse: Your word has been tested to the uttermost, *
value.halfverse: and your servant holds it dear.
yet I do not forget your commandments.
value.verse: I am small and of little account, *

value.halfverse: and your law is the truth.
value.verse: Your justice is an everlasting justice *
Trouble and distress have come upon me, *
value.halfverse: yet your commandments are my delight.

value.verse: The righteousness of your decrees is everlasting; *
value.halfverse: grant me understanding, that I may live.

value.verse: I call with my whole heart; *
value.halfverse: answer me, O LORD, that I may keep your statutes.
I will keep your decrees.
value.verse:
I call to you;
oh, that you would save me! *

value.halfverse: for in your word is my trust.
value.verse: Early in the morning I cry out to you, *
My eyes are open in the night watches, *
value.halfverse: that I may meditate upon your promise.

value.verse: Hear my voice, O LORD, according to your loving-kindness; *
value.halfverse: according to your judgments, give me life.

value.verse: They draw near who in malice persecute me; *
value.halfverse: they are very far from your law.

value.verse: You, O LORD, are near at hand, *
value.halfverse: and all your commandments are true.
that you have established them for ever.
value.verse: Long have I known from your decrees *

value.halfverse: for I do not forget your law.
value.verse: Behold my affliction and deliver me, *

value.halfverse: according to your promise, give me life.
value.verse: Plead my cause and redeem me; *

value.halfverse: for they do not study your statutes.
value.verse: Deliverance is far from the wicked, *
Great is your compassion, O LORD; *
value.halfverse: preserve my life, according to your judgments.

value.verse: There are many who persecute and oppress me, *
value.halfverse: yet I have not swerved from your decrees.

value.verse: I look with loathing at the faithless, *
value.halfverse: for they have not kept your word.

value.verse: See how I love your commandments! *
value.halfverse: O LORD, in your mercy, preserve me.

value.verse: The heart of your word is truth; *
value.halfverse: all your righteous judgments endure for evermore.

value.verse: Rulers have persecuted me without a cause, *
value.halfverse: but my heart stands in awe of your word.
as one who finds great spoils.
value.verse: I am as glad because of your promise *
As for lies, I hate and abhor them, *
value.halfverse: but your law is my love.
because of your righteous judgments.
value.verse: Seven times a day do I praise you, *
Great peace have they who love your law; *
value.halfverse: for them there is no stumbling block.

value.verse: I have hoped for your salvation, O LORD, *
value.halfverse: and have fulfilled your commandments.
and I have loved them deeply.
value.verse: I have kept your decrees *
I have kept your commandments and decrees, *
value.halfverse: for all my ways are before you.

value.verse: Let my cry come before you, O LORD; *
value.halfverse: give me understanding, according to your word.
deliver me, according to your promise.
value.verse: Let my supplication come before you; *

value.halfverse: when you teach me your statutes.
value.verse: My lips shall pour forth your praise, *
My tongue shall sing of your promise, *
value.halfverse: for all your commandments are righteous.

value.verse: Let your hand be ready to help me, *
value.halfverse: for I have chosen your commandments.

value.verse: I long for your salvation, O LORD, *
value.halfverse: and your law is my delight.
and let your judgments help me.
value.verse: Let me live, and I will praise you, *

value.halfverse:
search for your servant,
 for I do not forget your commandments.
value.verse: I have gone astray like a sheep that is lost; *
